full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN CHOS RGYAL BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL BYED ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B (CES 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL BYED ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, KHA GCIG GIS 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZER BA DE LA CHOS RGYAL KYI BZLOG BSGYUR NYES MING BTAGS NAS MI MTHUN PA GCIG BYAS PA MANG PO YOD PA DANG, CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR YIG RNYING PA MA RNYED DANG, SNGO MO NAS DON GNYER CAN DGA' BSKUL ZHING, SLAD YANG SMAN PA BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS SBYIN BDAG GI RIM 'GRO DGOS PA CHE ZHING BSKUL NGO MCHOG PAR, RANG DANG SKAL MNYAM GZHAN LA'ANG AE SRID SNYAM PA SLOB GNYER MA BYAS PA'I BLON PO SNYING KHAMS CAN CHOS RJE BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING CAN GYIS BLA MA GONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG RGYUN LA BRTEN NAS @005B SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O, ,DGE'O, ,LEGS SO, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
